name: Concept - Magic / Rune Magic
description:
LoRA by Filber F

Magic LoRA

Weights ~0.8-1.0 Does tend to change style of art. Can use in inpaint to avoid drastic art changes or lower strengths.

Prompts : magic_circle, magic, (color/type of magic) power,

meta.prompt: masterpiece, best quality, detailed, 1girl, tight dress, magic circle, casting spells, fantasy, purple power, power, fire, meteor, mage, high-resolution, medieval village, storm, burning, village street, rock, dirt <lora:Concept - Runemagic:1>
